title: How to prepare for IAS? And which books should I refer for the same - Quora

response.answer_text: Read NCERT from class 6 -12, ( history, geography) economics of class 11 &12, science upto 12, art and culture of class 11. Read either Indian express or the Hindu religiously, make short notes of it for different GS papers Read Yojana magazine, every month. Memorize the syllabus and segragate accordingly ( better get a print out of syllabus and stick it up front on wall) Answer writing should start once u finish a chapter. Try to improve your writing skill. Write anything and everything ( about a movie you watched, about a life experience, about a match u watched) this will definitely improve ur writing skill.
